en: The 5th May is Children's Day.

en: I want to make a reservation for JAL flight one to Tokyo on May 12.
zh: 我想预订五月十二号飞往东京的日航一号航班。

en: Would you please meet me at Yaesu central gate of Tokyo Station on Monday, May 10th at 3:00 p.m.?
zh: 您能于5月10日星期一下午3点在东京站八重洲中央检票口与我会面吗？

en: Please cancel my reservation on JAL flight two to New York on May 10.
zh: 请取消我预定的5月10日飞往纽约的日航二号航班。

en: Take the elevator to the fifth floor.
zh: 请乘电梯到五楼。

en: Five miles is a long distance to walk.
zh: 五英里走路很远。

en: Five miles is a suitable distance for a picnic.
zh: 五英里是野餐的合适距离。

en: Do you have a five-pound note?
zh: 你有一张五英镑的纸币吗？

en: Can I borrow five pounds from you?
zh: 我可以向你借五英镑吗？

en: 5 is less than 8.
zh: 5小于8。

en: Four times five is twenty.
zh: 四乘以五等于二十。

en: Here's $5.
zh: 这是五美元。

en: 5 dollars in quarters and a dollar in dimes.
zh: 5美元是四分之一美元硬币，1美元是十分之一美元硬币。

en: I have little more than 5 dollars.
zh: 我只有略多于5美元。

en: Add 5 and 2, and you get 7.
zh: 5加2等于7。

en: He died aged 54 years.
zh: 他去世时54岁。

en: Where are the bags from Flight 57?
zh: 57号航班的行李在哪里？

en: You have a personal tax exemption of 500,000 yen.
zh: 您有50万日元的个人免税额。

en: Compared to fifty years ago, today's aviation technology has made great progress.
zh: 与五十年前相比，今天的航空技术取得了巨大的进步。

en: Fifty years ago anyone could have bought the land.
zh: 五十年前，任何人都可以买到这块土地。

en: This is the hottest summer we have had in fifty years.
zh: 这是我们五十年来最热的夏天。

en: You gave me only fifty cents.
zh: 你只给了我五十分。

en: No fewer than 50 passengers were killed.
zh: 至少有50名乘客遇难。

en: No less than fifty passengers were injured in the traffic accident.
zh: 在交通事故中，受伤的乘客不少于五十人。

en: As many as fifty students gathered to hear his lecture.
zh: 多达五十名学生聚集在一起听他的讲座。

en: There were 20 failures among 50 applicants.
zh: 在50名申请者中，有20人失败了。

en: He must be over fifty.
zh: 他一定超过五十岁了。

en: Write in less than 50 words.
zh: 用少于50个字写。

en: It's 50 yen.
zh: 五十日元。

en: Follow the street for about 50 meters, and you will see a post office.
zh: 沿着这条街走大约五十米，你就会看到一个邮局。

en: I'd like to borrow fifty dollars from you.
zh: 我想向你借五十美元。

en: Are you able to grant us a special discount of 5% for 50 sets of the product?
zh: 您能给我们50套产品提供5%的特别折扣吗？

en: I was late, so I missed flight 501.
zh: 我迟到了，所以错过了501次航班。

en: There were as many as five hundred people present.
zh: 当时有多达五百人出席。

en: No fewer than five hundred students were present.
zh: 不少于五百名学生出席了。

en: 500 policemen were put on strict alert.
zh: 五百名警察处于高度戒备状态。

en: Can you lend me 500 yen?
zh: 你能借我五百日元吗？

en: Can you sell the book to me for 500 yen?
zh: 你能以五百日元的价格把这本书卖给我吗？

en: Five hundred dollars is a small sum for him.
zh: 五百美元对他来说是一笔小数目。

en: I have about 5,000 yen.
zh: 我大约有五千日元。

en: We'd like a deposit of $50.
zh: 我们需要50美元的定金。

en: It is easy to add 5 to 10.
zh: 5加到10很容易。

en: I walked three-fourths of a mile.
zh: 我走了四分之三英里。

en: For four years, he cut the grass at the original price, but I noticed that toward the end of that year, he had a helper with him quite often.
zh: 四年里，他一直按原价割草，但我注意到在那一年快结束的时候，他经常带着一个帮手。

en: I haven't heard a word from them in over four years.
zh: 我已经四年多没收到他们的消息了。

en: Four boys amused themselves playing cards.
zh: 四个男孩玩牌自娱自乐。

en: Four boys are making their way along the street.
zh: 四个男孩正沿着街道走。

en: She rented a four-room flat.
zh: 她租了一套四室的公寓。

en: The fourth period was moved up to the third.
zh: 第四节课被提前到了第三节。

en: Take this medicine every four hours.
zh: 每四个小时服用一次这种药。

en: Could you keep my bags here until four?
zh: 你能把我的包放在这里到四点吗？

en: I will help you if I have finished my work by four.
zh: 如果我四点前完成工作，我会帮助你。

en: He wouldn't be available until four.
zh: 他四点前没空。

en: At four o'clock, they arrived at the hotel.
zh: 四点钟他们到达了酒店。

en: Call me at four; I must take the first train.
zh: 四点给我打电话；我必须赶第一班火车。

en: I am leaving at four.
zh: 我四点离开。

en: I made an appointment to see the doctor at four o'clock.
zh: 我预约了四点钟去看医生。

en: At four we could go home.
zh: 四点我们可以回家。

en: Let's take the 4:10 train.
zh: 我们坐四点十分的火车吧。

en: April is the fourth month of the year.
zh: 四月是一年中的第四个月。

en: Many kinds of flowers come out in the middle of April.
zh: 四月中旬，各种各样的花都开了。

en: The birthstone of April is diamond.
zh: 四月的诞生石是钻石。

en: You must return the book by the end of April.
zh: 你必须在四月底之前还书。

en: Our rates increased in April.
zh: 我们的价格在四月份上涨了。

en: In April we have a lot of school events.
zh: 四月份我们有很多学校活动。

en: The cold weather extended into April.
zh: 寒冷的天气一直延续到四月。

en: It's rather cold for April.
zh: 四月的天气有点冷。

en: Public utility charges will go up next April.
zh: 公用事业收费将在明年四月上涨。

en: The salary will be raised from April.
zh: 工资将从四月开始提高。

en: There's to be a strike on April 6th.
zh: 4月6日要举行罢工。

en: We suggest April 6 as a date for your visit.
zh: 我们建议您在4月6日来访。

en: I'd like to meet you either on the morning of April 5 or on the afternoon of April 6.
zh: 我想在4月5日上午或4月6日下午与您见面。

en: Would you please arrange to meet with me either on the morning of April 5 or 6?
zh: 您能否安排在4月5日上午或6日与我会面？

en: Would it be possible to set up a meeting with us on April 5 or 6?
zh: 是否可以在4月5日或6日安排与我们会面？

en: On April 1, Nanyo Foods Co. Ltd. will move to its new building in Yokohama.
zh: 4月1日，南洋食品有限公司将迁至横滨的新大楼。

en: Four multiplied by two is eight.
zh: 四乘以二是八。

en: Having failed four times, he didn't try anymore.
zh: 失败了四次，他不再尝试了。

en: You can make 4, 6 or 12 payments.
zh: 您可以分4期、6期或12期付款。

en: Four hundred million people speak English as their first language.
zh: 四亿人以英语为母语。

en: By the time we had walked four miles, he was exhausted.
zh: 当我们走了四英里的时候，他已经筋疲力尽了。

en: Four miles is a good distance.
zh: 四英里是个不错的距离。

en: I'd like to buy two 45-cent stamps, please.
zh: 请给我两张45美分的邮票。

en: It will cost you 45 cents.
zh: 这将花费你45美分。

en: Please transfer 450 dollars to my account.
zh: 请转450美元到我的账户。

en: Please put me through to 442-5511.
It's in front of a restaurant on 42nd street.
zh: 它在第42街的一家餐厅前面。

en: The following is what he started to think, as he made his way to room 418.
zh: 以下是他开始思考的内容，当他前往418房间时。

en: 400,000 gallons of oil have spilled out of the pipeline.
zh: 有40万加仑的石油从管道中泄漏出来。

en: We ordered 40 minutes ago.
zh: 我们40分钟前点的餐。

en: Forty years passed.
zh: 四十年过去了。

en: I got out of the car at 40th Street.
zh: 我在第40街下了车。

en: A man shouldn't be a pastor until he's in his forties.
zh: 一个人不应该在他四十多岁之前当牧师。

en: The class of forty includes eighteen girls.
zh: 四十人的班级包括十八个女孩。

en: It was not until he was forty that he began to study German.
zh: 直到他四十岁才开始学习德语。

en: He must be nearly forty.
zh: 他一定快四十岁了。

en: Run in the 40 meters.
zh: 跑40米。

en: Forty miles is a good distance.
zh: 四十英里是个不错的距离。

en: Bear in mind that half one's life is lived after forty.
zh: 记住，人生的后半段是在四十岁之后度过的。

en: You need not write more than 400 words.
zh: 你不需要写超过400字。

en: More than 40 percent of the students go to university.
zh: 超过40%的学生上大学。

en: No less than 40 percent of students go on to university.
zh: 不少于40%的学生继续上大学。

en: Take three steps and jump.
zh: 走三步然后跳。

en: Do you know the reason why two-thirds of the students did not attend the student meeting?
zh: 你知道为什么三分之二的学生没有参加学生会议吗？

en: Will you notify me after 3 minutes?
zh: 三分钟后你会通知我吗？

en: The third star belonged to a certain king.
zh: 第三颗星星属于某个国王。

en: The age of the carpet is a third thing to consider.
zh: 地毯的年代是需要考虑的第三件事。

en: I had a stillborn baby three years ago.
zh: 三年前我生了一个死胎。

en: The war began three years later.
zh: 战争在三年后爆发。

en: Peace has returned after three years of war.
zh: 经过三年的战争，和平终于回来了。

en: Three years is a long time, I feel.
zh: 三年是很长的时间，我觉得。

en: After three straight late nights at work, I feel like I'm drowning in work.
zh: 连续三个晚上熬夜工作后，我觉得自己快要被工作淹没了。

en: It rained three days on end.
zh: 连续下了三天的雨。

en: Please come in three days.
zh: 请三天后过来。

en: It was not until three days after that I knew she had disappeared.
zh: 直到三天后我才知道她失踪了。

en: It has rained for three days on end.
zh: 已经连续下了三天的雨。

en: He stayed there for three days.
zh: 他在那里待了三天。

en: I will answer within three days.
zh: 我会在三天内回复。

en: Let's make it about a three-day trip.
zh: 我们来安排一个三天左右的旅行吧。

en: The reply came after three days.
zh: 三天后才收到回复。

en: We lost by a score of three to one.
zh: 我们以三比一的比分输了。

en: He's beating me, three to zip.
zh: 他打败了我，三比零。

en: Three ships were given to him by the queen.
zh: 女王给了他三艘船。

en: Even three centuries ago, most Western Europeans still used their fingers.
zh: 即使在三个世纪前，大多数西欧人仍然用手指计数。

en: A gang of three robbed the bank in broad daylight.
zh: 一个三人团伙在光天化日之下抢劫了银行。

en: Three men menaced him with knives.
zh: 三个男人用刀威胁他。

en: The three men had 50 pounds among them.
zh: 这三个人总共有50英镑。

en: The three people gave three different accounts of the accident.
zh: 这三个人对事故给出了三种不同的说法。

en: All three hated one another.
zh: 他们三个都互相憎恨。

en: The three neighbours helped each other.
zh: 三个邻居互相帮助。

en: Three Chinese students were admitted to the college.
zh: 三名中国学生被这所大学录取了。

en: There were three men.
zh: 有三个人。

en: Three men jumped out, rolled an old mower down the ramp.
zh: 三个人跳了出来，把一个旧的割草机从斜坡上推了下去。

en: Three men broke out of prison yesterday.
zh: 昨天有三个人越狱了。

en: Three big men attacked him and stole his money.
zh: 三个大汉袭击了他，抢走了他的钱。

en: Three babies crying incessantly gave me a headache.
zh: 三个婴儿不停地哭闹，让我头疼。

en: Three students made short speeches and introduced themselves and their countries.
zh: 三名学生做了简短的演讲，介绍了自己和自己的国家。

en: The three boys opened the doors of the building.
zh: 三个男孩打开了大楼的门。

en: Three boys climbed the trees like a bunch of monkeys.
zh: 三个男孩像一群猴子一样爬上了树。

en: Three children were playing in the park.
zh: 三个孩子在公园里玩耍。

en: Each of the three boys won a prize.
zh: 三个男孩每人都得了一个奖。

en: Three candidates ran for President and he was elected.
zh: 三位候选人竞选总统，他当选了。

en: Three children sat on the sofa.
zh: 三个孩子坐在沙发上。

en: Three nurses attended the dying minister night and day.
zh: 三名护士日夜照顾着这位垂死的部长。

en: While one of them sped around major parts of the property on the mower, a second made a few sweeps at some tall weeds on the edge of my wife's garden, and the third got into the truck and smoked a cigarette.
zh: 其中一人开着割草机在房产的主要区域转来转去，第二个人在我妻子的花园边缘清理了一些高大的杂草，第三个人上了卡车抽烟。

en: Who runs the fastest of the three?
zh: 三个人中谁跑得最快？

en: I am the oldest of the three.
zh: 我是他们三个中最大的。

en: Of the three boys, the youngest is the most attractive.
zh: 三个男孩中，最小的那个最有魅力。

en: This meal is adequate for three.
zh: 这顿饭够三个人吃。

en: Three people are still missing.
zh: 仍有三人失踪。

en: After spending three weeks looking for a job, he found a well-paid one.
zh: 在花了三个星期找工作后，他找到了一份高薪的工作。

en: The weather stayed cold for three weeks.
zh: 天气持续寒冷了三个星期。

en: It was three weeks before she wrote an answer to Tom.
zh: 过了三个星期她才给汤姆回信。

en: Who has been absent from school for three weeks?
zh: 谁已经缺课三个星期了？

en: We have French third period.
zh: 我们第三节是法语课。

en: After three hours of discussion we got nowhere.
zh: 经过三个小时的讨论，我们毫无进展。

en: It began to rain heavily more than three hours ago.
zh: 三个多小时前就开始下大雨了。

en: Can you extend my stay until three o'clock?
zh: 你能把我的住宿延期到三点吗？

en: Please wait until 3:00. She'll be back then.
zh: 请等到三点。她那时会回来。

en: I expect him to be here by three.
zh: 我希望他三点之前能到。

en: Let's have tea at 3:00.
zh: 我们三点喝茶吧。

en: Call her up at three.
zh: 三点给她打电话。

en: I went to his house at 3 o'clock, but he was out.
zh: 我三点去了他家，但他不在。

en: I have an appointment with the dentist at 3 o'clock.
zh: 我三点和牙医有个预约。

en: Let's make it three.
zh: 就定三个吧。

en: I'll call for you at three.
zh: 我三点来接你。

en: Come to my room between three and four.
zh: 三点到四点之间来我房间。

en: I can come at three.
zh: 我三点能来。

en: Please come here at 3 o'clock precisely.
zh: 请在三点整准时来这里。

en: I'd like to make an appointment for my three-year-old son.
zh: 我想为我三岁的儿子预约。

en: An orphan at three, he was brought up by a distant relative.
zh: 他三岁时成了孤儿，由一个远房亲戚抚养长大。

en: How about $100 for three?
zh: 三个一百美元怎么样？

en: March comes between February and April.
zh: 三月在二月和四月之间。

en: March winds and April showers bring forth May flowers.
zh: 三月的风和四月的雨带来五月的花。

en: At the end of March we'll marry.
zh: 三月底我们将结婚。

en: In March, many flowers come out.
zh: 三月，很多花都开了。

en: I would greatly appreciate it if we could change our appointment to 3:00 pm on March 6.
zh: 如果能把我们的预约改到3月6日下午3点，我将不胜感激。

en: March 3 is the day of the Dolls' Festival.
zh: 3月3日是女儿节。

en: We feel that March 1 would be more convenient.
zh: 我们觉得3月1日会更方便。

en: It has been announced that railway fares will be raised by 10 percent starting on the first of March.
zh: 据宣布，铁路票价将从3月1日起上涨10%。

en: On March 15 we will have been married for 20 years.
zh: 到3月15日，我们将结婚20年。

en: March 15 will be my last day of school.
zh: 3月15日将是我上学的最后一天。

en: Please reconfirm the reservation by March 10.
zh: 请在3月10日前重新确认预订。

en: The sum of all the angles in a triangle equals 180 degrees.
zh: 三角形的所有角之和等于180度。

en: I threw up three times.
zh: 我吐了三次。

en: If you add three to four, you get seven.
zh: 如果你把三加到四，你会得到七。

en: 3 to the third power is 27.
zh: 3的三次方是27。

en: 3 multiplied by 5 is 15.
zh: 3乘以5等于15。

en: Add 5 to 3 and you have 8.
zh: 5加3等于8。

en: If you add 3 to 3, you get 6.
zh: 如果你把3加到3，你会得到6。

en: The average of 3, 4 and 5 is 4.
zh: 3、4和5的平均数是4。

en: After three months, he got used to the life in the town.
zh: 三个月后，他习惯了镇上的生活。

en: I will have spent all this money in three months.
zh: 我将在三个月内花光所有的钱。

en: Because a new commodity is announced, it is in good supply every three months.
zh: 由于一种新商品被宣布，它每三个月都有充足的供应。

en: It will be three months before our new school building is completed.
zh: 我们的新教学楼将在三个月后完工。

en: It is difficult to speak three languages.
zh: 说三种语言很困难。

en: I'll be staying here for three months.
zh: 我将在这里待三个月。

en: Three months is too short a time to finish the experiment.
zh: 三个月的时间太短，无法完成实验。

en: The closest I have is a 38.
zh: 我最接近的是38码。

en: For 381 days, the buses of Montgomery travelled back and forth on their routes, almost empty.
zh: 在381天里，蒙哥马利的公共汽车几乎空无一人地在他们的路线上来回行驶。

en: May I borrow a duplicate key for Room 360?
zh: 我可以借用360房间的备用钥匙吗？

en: I received your Model 345 in good condition.
zh: 我收到了您的345型号，状况良好。

en: How do I get to Gate 33?
zh: 我怎么去33号登机口？

en: Take it to the men in Room 318.
zh: 把它交给318房间的人。

en: The car broke down after half an hour's driving.
zh: 车开了半个小时就抛锚了。

en: You should have left half an hour earlier.
zh: 你应该早半个小时出发的。

en: You ought to have started half an hour ago.
zh: 你本应该半小时前就开始的。

en: Please come back after half an hour.
zh: 请半小时后回来。

en: I'll be over in half an hour.
zh: 我半小时后就到。

en: I was kept waiting for nearly half an hour.
zh: 我等了将近半个小时。

en: Go on running for thirty minutes.
zh: 继续跑三十分钟。

en: You have to come back in 30 minutes.
zh: 你必须在30分钟内回来。

en: We succeeded in breaking the door open after trying for half an hour.
zh: 我们尝试了半个小时后，终于把门打开了。

en: If I have to wait 30 minutes, I'll order later.
zh: 如果我要等30分钟，我就晚点再点餐。

en: It took half an hour.
zh: 花了半个小时。

en: Let's break off for half an hour and have some coffee.
zh: 我们休息半个小时，喝杯咖啡吧。

en: Given only thirty minutes, we couldn't answer all the questions.
zh: 只有三十分钟，我们无法回答所有问题。

en: It leaves every thirty minutes.
zh: 它每三十分钟发车一次。

en: I run to the toilet every thirty minutes.
zh: 我每三十分钟就跑去厕所。

en: Fashions of thirty years ago have come back in style.
zh: 三十年前的时尚又流行回来了。

en: I'd like to confirm my reservation for the 30th.
zh: 我想确认我30号的预订。

en: No fewer than thirty people were present.
zh: 到场的人不少于三十个。

en: All of a sudden, the thirty-story skyscraper went up in flames.
zh: 突然间，那栋三十层高的摩天大楼燃起了大火。

en: Count up to thirty.
zh: 数到三十。

en: Let's begin at page 30.
zh: 我们从第30页开始吧。

en: Could you bring my breakfast to room 305?
zh: 你能把我的早餐送到305房间吗？

en: For three hundred years they have farmed the surrounding land.
zh: 三百年来，他们一直在耕种周围的土地。

en: You are covered with a $300 deductible.
zh: 你有300美元的免赔额。

en: Over three thousand people attended the concert.
zh: 超过三千人参加了音乐会。

en: You should stay in bed for three or four days.
zh: 你应该卧床休息三到四天。

en: If you agree to buy 3000 of them, we'll give you a 3 percent discount.
zh: 如果你同意购买三千个，我们可以给你百分之三的折扣。

en: Two tears fell down her cheeks.
zh: 两行眼泪从她的脸颊上流了下来。

en: Twenty thousand yen, please.
zh: 请付两万日元。

en: I'd like two prints of each.
zh: 每种照片我要洗两张。

en: Two stockings are called a pair of stockings.
zh: 两只袜子叫做一双袜子。

en: I couldn't drink both bottles, so I left one for you.
zh: 我喝不完两瓶，所以给你留了一瓶。

en: The two streets run parallel to one another.
zh: 这两条街道彼此平行。

en: The two roads cut across the street from us.
zh: 这两条路从我们面前横穿过街道。

en: The two streets intersect at right angles.
zh: 这两条街道成直角相交。

en: Advance two steps.
zh: 向前走两步。

en: I want to rent an apartment with two rooms.
zh: 我想租一套两室的公寓。

en: I have two dogs. One is white and the other black.
zh: 我有两条狗。一条是白色的，另一条是黑色的。

en: Both dogs are asleep.
zh: 两条狗都在睡觉。

en: If you run after two hares, you will catch neither.
zh: 脚踏两条船，一事无成。

en: The second sentence was just as long.
zh: 第二句话也一样长。

en: Do I take the second street on the left?
zh: 我应该走左边第二条街吗？

en: The second argument deals with the naturalization of foreign workers in Japan.
zh: 第二个论点是关于外国工人在日本的归化问题。

en: They're in aisle two.
zh: 他们在二号通道。

en: I had an abortion two years ago.
zh: 我两年前做过流产。

en: I had an ectopic pregnancy two years ago.
zh: 我两年前有过宫外孕。

en: I saw her somewhere two years ago.
zh: 我两年前在某个地方见过她。

en: I lost the eyesight in my right eye two years ago.
zh: 我两年前失去了右眼的视力。

en: Let's meet together two years from today.
zh: 让我们从今天起两年后见面。

en: Two years have passed since I last met you.
zh: 自从上次见面以来已经过去两年了。

en: Two years is a long time to wait.
zh: 两年时间太长了。

en: The prisoner who escaped two days ago is still at large.
zh: 两天前逃脱的囚犯仍然在逃。

en: I have a reservation for two nights.
zh: 我预订了两晚。

en: After two days our food gave out.
zh: 两天后我们的食物吃完了。

en: It has snowed for two days.
zh: 已经下了两天的雪了。

en: It has been raining for two days.
zh: 已经下了两天的雨了。

en: I have had to stay in bed for two days.
zh: 我不得不在床上躺了两天。

en: I tried twice, but neither try worked.
zh: 我尝试了两次，但两次都没成功。

en: We covered three states in two days.
zh: 两天内我们走了三个州。

en: Do you still trust him after he broke his promise twice?
zh: 在他两次违背承诺后，你还信任他吗？

en: Never again did she enter the house.
zh: 她再也没有进入过那所房子。

en: Never tell me a lie again.
zh: 再也不要对我撒谎。

en: Don't be late for school again.
zh: 以后上学不要再迟到了。

en: Don't ever do that kind of thing again.
zh: 以后再也不要做那种事了。

en: Not a few people have two cars.
zh: 有两辆车的人不在少数。

en: The two cars collided with a crash.
zh: 两辆车砰的一声相撞了。

en: The two buses resemble each other at first glance.
zh: 乍一看，这两辆公共汽车很相似。

en: You should compare the two motorcycles.
zh: 你应该比较一下这两辆摩托车。

en: I'd like to reserve a table for two.
zh: 我想预订一张两人桌。

en: Do you have a double room?
zh: 你们有双人间吗？

en: Both are alive.
zh: 两个人都活着。

en: The comparison between the two was to his disadvantage.
zh: 两者的比较对他不利。

en: They have announced their engagement.
zh: 他们已经宣布订婚了。

en: They are now man and wife duly married.
zh: 他们现在是正式结婚的夫妻。

en: The two men understood one another perfectly, and had a mutual respect for each other's strong qualities.
zh: 这两个人彼此完全了解，并且互相尊重对方的优点。

en: The two people were shaking hands heartily as if they had not seen each other for years.
zh: 两个人热烈地握着手，好像多年未见。

en: They got out of the bus and walked two kilometres in the hot sun.
zh: 他们下了公共汽车，在炎热的阳光下走了两公里。

en: They had their marriage registered on February 5.
zh: 他们于二月五日登记结婚。

en: The two lovers sat face to face, drinking tea.
zh: 两个恋人面对面坐着，喝着茶。

en: The two friends have formed a deep bond of friendship.
zh: 两个朋友建立了深厚的友谊。

en: Two soldiers kept guard at the gate.
zh: 两名士兵在门口站岗。

en: Two men are trying to get a handle on what's wrong with the car.
zh: 两个男人正试图弄清楚汽车出了什么问题。

en: I saw two men struggling for the knife.
zh: 我看到两个男人在争夺刀子。

en: There is a wide gap in the opinions between the two students.
zh: 两个学生之间的意见存在很大差距。

en: Two people think of her as their daughter.
zh: 有两个人把她当成自己的女儿。

en: Two gentlemen have been waiting to see you.
zh: 有两位先生一直在等您。

en: A quarrel estranged one boy from the other.
zh: 一次争吵使一个男孩与另一个男孩疏远了。

en: The two boys became intimate friends at the camp.
zh: 两个男孩在营地里成了亲密的朋友。

en: The two ladies smiled at each other.
zh: 两位女士互相微笑。

en: There were two women on board.
zh: 船上有两名妇女。

en: Two women are taking it easy on a bench in the park.
zh: 两位妇女在公园的长椅上放松休息。

en: There was a violent clash of opinions between the two leaders.
zh: 两位领导人之间发生了激烈的意见冲突。

en: The ages of the two children put together was equivalent to that of their father.
zh: 两个孩子的年龄加起来相当于他们父亲的年龄。

en: There were two children playing on the street.
zh: 有两个孩子在街上玩耍。

en: The two candidates are struggling for mastery.
zh: 两位候选人正在争夺控制权。

en: Two policemen arrested a burglar. They caught him sneaking into Mrs. Miller's.
zh: 两名警察逮捕了一名窃贼。他们抓到他偷偷溜进米勒太太家。

en: The two boys cooked their meal between them.
zh: 两个男孩一起做了饭。

en: The two brothers couldn't get along with each other.
zh: 两兄弟相处不好。

en: Love began to grow between the two.
zh: 爱开始在两人之间滋长。

en: The two students will be talking to each other.
zh: 两个学生将会互相交谈。

en: I met two foreigners, one was from Canada, and the other from England.
zh: 我遇到了两个外国人，一个是加拿大人，另一个是英国人。

en: There was a great gap between the views of the two.
zh: 这两个人的观点之间存在很大的差距。

en: Either of the two must go.
zh: 这两个人中必须走一个。

en: He is the more diligent of the two.
zh: 他是两个人中比较勤奋的。

en: That looks like an awful lot for two people.
zh: 这看起来对两个人来说太多了。

en: Two's company, but three's a crowd.
zh: 两人成伴，三人成群。（人多了反而不自在）

en: Are both of you ready to go?
zh: 你们两个都准备好了吗？

en: They are both very excited.
zh: 他们俩都很兴奋。

en: The couple was quarrelling and Chris knocked Beth down.
zh: 这对夫妇在争吵，克里斯把贝丝打倒了。

en: We stayed an extra two weeks in Paris; and we spent it seeing the sights.
zh: 我们在巴黎多待了两个星期；我们用这段时间观光游览。

en: Two weeks ago, I visited Disneyland for the first time.
zh: 两周前，我第一次去了迪士尼乐园。

en: I had been thinking about our new project for two weeks, but I couldn't come up with a good idea.
zh: 我已经考虑了我们新项目两个星期了，但我还是想不出一个好主意。

en: Please come again two weeks from today.
zh: 请在今天起两周后再来。

en: He will get better in two weeks.
zh: 他会在两周内好起来的。

en: It will go away by itself in two weeks.
zh: 它会在两周内自行消失。

en: We have not had a single drop of rain for two weeks.
zh: 我们已经两个星期没下过一滴雨了。

en: I will be back in two week's time.
zh: 我两周后回来。

en: Two weeks went by.
zh: 两个星期过去了。

en: The two companies plan to unite.
zh: 这两家公司计划合并。

en: The two companies are competing with each other.
zh: 这两家公司正在相互竞争。

en: I had been working for two hours when I suddenly felt sick.
zh: 我已经工作了两个小时，突然感到不舒服。

en: I'll be back in two hours.
zh: 我两小时后回来。

en: How about the one which starts two hours later?
zh: 晚两个小时开始的那一个怎么样？

en: I'll be back within two hours.
zh: 我会在两小时内回来。

en: Two hours is too long to wait.
zh: 等两个小时太久了。

en: I was kept waiting for as long as two hours.
zh: 我被足足等了两个小时。

en: Communications have been cut off for two hours because of a thunderstorm.
zh: 由于雷暴，通讯中断了两个小时。

en: I slept only two hours. No wonder I'm sleepy.
zh: 我只睡了两个小时。难怪我困。

en: I missed the two o'clock plane.
zh: 我错过了两点钟的飞机。

en: We had a late lunch at two.
zh: 我们两点吃了顿晚午餐。

en: If they started at two, they should arrive at six.
zh: 如果他们两点开始，他们应该六点到达。

en: I'm going to see her off at the airport at 2:00.
zh: 我打算两点去机场送她。

en: I made a doctor's appointment for two.
zh: 我预约了两点的医生。

en: Would two o'clock be all right?
zh: 两点可以吗？

en: I have been writing since two o'clock without a break.
zh: 我从两点开始一直在写作，没有休息。

en: I've been waiting for you since two o'clock.
zh: 我从两点开始就一直在等你。

en: I'd like to get a medical examination for my two-year-old daughter.
zh: 我想给我两岁的女儿做个体检。

en: Can a two-year-old boy run that fast?
zh: 一个两岁的男孩能跑那么快吗？

en: The trade imbalance between two nations should be improved.
zh: 两国之间的贸易不平衡应该得到改善。

en: The path between the two houses was blocked by snow.
zh: 两栋房子之间的路被雪堵住了。

en: The two houses stand alongside of each other.
zh: 这两栋房子并排而立。

en: Two houses were burned down in the fire.
zh: 火灾中两栋房子被烧毁。

en: Can we meet February 28, around 3:00 pm?
zh: 我们可以在2月28日下午3点左右见面吗？

en: With regard to our appointment on February 27, I regret to inform you that I will not be able to keep it because my business trip schedule has been changed.
zh: 关于我们2月27日的预约，我很遗憾地通知您，由于我的出差行程已更改，我将无法赴约。

en: I would like to confirm the following for our meeting at our office on February 27.
zh: 我想确认一下2月27日在我们办公室的会议。

en: Could we see each other for about an hour on February 27 at 3:00 pm?
zh: 我们可以在2月27日下午3点见面大约一个小时吗？

en: I am free all afternoon on February 27.
zh: 2月27日下午我都有空。

en: This is to confirm the appointment we made to meet at your office at 10:00 am on Monday, February 27th.
zh: 这是为了确认我们约定于2月27日星期一上午10点在您办公室会面的事宜。

en: I have not received the goods scheduled for arrival here on February 15.
zh: 我还没有收到原定于2月15日到达的货物。

en: Anybody with at least a two-digit IQ knows this was a politically biased choice.
zh: 任何智商至少两位数的人都知道这是一个带有政治偏见的决定。

en: On February 14 Americans celebrate St. Valentine's Day.
zh: 2月14日，美国人庆祝情人节。

en: There's a good view of Mt. Akagi from upstairs.
zh: 从楼上可以很好地看到赤城山。

en: Go upstairs and bring down my trunk.
zh: 上楼把我的箱子拿下来。

en: Go upstairs and go to bed.
zh: 上楼睡觉去吧。

en: Some kind of party upstairs kept me up till one last night.
zh: 昨晚楼上有什么派对吵得我到凌晨一点都没睡着。

en: We have two spare rooms upstairs, neither of which has been used for years.
zh: 我们楼上有两间空房，都已经好几年没用过了。

en: Can you bring down my trunk from upstairs?
zh: 你能从楼上把我的箱子拿下来吗？

en: The alarm was heard ringing at an early hour on the second floor.
zh: 在二楼，人们听到闹钟在清晨响起。

en: There is a bridge two miles upstream.
zh: 上游两英里处有一座桥。

en: It's about two miles.
zh: 大约两英里。

en: Walk two blocks, and turn left.
zh: 走两个街区，然后左转。

en: Four is an unlucky number in Japanese.
zh: 四在日语中是一个不吉利的数字。

en: Two pints are equal to a quart.
zh: 两品脱等于一夸脱。

en: Two is the fourth root of sixteen.
zh: 二是十六的四次方根。

en: Twice two is four.
zh: 二乘以二是四。

en: The sum of two plus three plus four is nine.
zh: 二加三加四的和是九。

en: Turn right at the second corner.
zh: 在第二个拐角处向右转。

en: Two problems remained unsolved.
zh: 还有两个问题没有解决。

en: Of the two stories, the latter story is better.
zh: 在这两个故事中，后一个故事更好。

en: There is only a marginal difference between the two.
zh: 两者之间只有很小的差异。

en: The two factions gang up with each other.
zh: 这两个派系互相勾结。

en: There used to be a bridge between two river banks.
zh: 过去在两个河岸之间有一座桥。

en: May I ask a couple of questions?
zh: 我可以问几个问题吗？

en: The two classes were brought together into a larger class.
zh: 这两个班级被合并成一个更大的班级。

en: The two countries were united under one government.
zh: 这两个国家在一个政府的统治下统一起来。

en: There does not seem to be any difference of meaning between the two constructions.
zh: 这两种结构之间似乎没有任何意义上的区别。

en: There doesn't seem any difference of meaning between the two constructions.
zh: 这两种结构之间似乎没有任何意义上的区别。

en: There's a vital link between the two.
zh: 两者之间存在至关重要的联系。

en: Two pictures were doubled.
zh: 两张照片被复制了一倍。

en: Two families live in the same house.
zh: 两家人住在同一栋房子里。

en: There is not much difference between the two opinions.
zh: 这两种观点之间没有太大区别。

en: Nobody can do two things at once.
zh: 没有人能同时做两件事。

en: Two groups united to form a party.
zh: 两个团体联合组成了一个政党。

en: The two clubs united to form one.
zh: 两个俱乐部联合成了一个。

en: By installing two carburetors that racing-car enthusiast souped up his motor considerably.
zh: 通过安装两个化油器，那位赛车爱好者大大提升了他的发动机性能。

en: It was very important to her which was the more beautiful of the two.
zh: 对她来说，两者中哪个更漂亮非常重要。

en: Choose either one or the other.
zh: 两者任选其一。

en: The two teams competed in the final game.
zh: 两支队伍在决赛中展开了角逐。

en: Please pay a deposit of two month's rent.
zh: 请支付两个月的房租作为押金。

en: We read the meter once every two months.
zh: 我们每两个月抄一次电表。

en: I had a whiplash injury two months ago.
zh: 我两个月前遭受了挥鞭式损伤。

en: By the age of 25, she had lived in five different countries.
zh: 到25岁时，她已经在五个不同的国家生活过。

en: Do you have any quarters?
zh: 你有25美分硬币吗？

en: I'm near the on ramp to 25 north.
zh: 我靠近25号公路北向的入口匝道。

en: Give me 20 quarters and the rest in dimes.
zh: 给我20个25美分硬币，剩下的用10美分硬币补齐。

en: Two hundred fifty kilograms is an extraordinary weight even for a sumo wrestler.
zh: 即使对于相扑选手来说，250公斤也是一个非同寻常的重量。

en: Is it open round the clock?
zh: 它是24小时营业吗？

en: Read the passage on page 22, please.
zh: 请阅读第22页的段落。

en: Flight 226 takes off at 10:30.
zh: 226次航班于10:30起飞。

en: The 21st century is going to be based on economic power.
zh: 21世纪将以经济实力为基础。

en: The twenty-first century starts in just a few years.
zh: 二十一世纪再过几年就要开始了。

en: The 21st century belongs to Asia.
zh: 二十一世纪属于亚洲。

en: Can you imagine what the 21st century will be like?
zh: 你能想象二十一世纪会是什么样子吗？

en: The twenty-first century begins in 2001.
zh: 二十一世纪始于2001年。

en: Please wait in front of Room 213.
zh: 请在213号房间前等候。

en: I want to make a person-to person call to 212-836-1725.
zh: 我想打一个对方付费电话，号码是212-836-1725。

en: Can I call you back in twenty minutes?
zh: 我可以在二十分钟后给你回电话吗？

en: I'll call back in twenty minutes.
zh: 我二十分钟后会回电话。

en: I'll be back in twenty minutes or so.
zh: 我大约二十分钟后回来。

en: Twenty years is a long time.
zh: 二十年是很长的时间。

en: I have kept available the afternoon of the 20th and the 21st, and would like to know if Mr Grant will be available for a meeting on either of those two days.
zh: 我已经预留了20号和21号的下午，想知道格兰特先生是否可以在这两天中的任何一天参加会议。

en: Many young women in their 20s plan to go abroad during their summer holidays.
zh: 许多二十多岁的年轻女性计划在暑假期间出国。

en: There is no telling how far science may have progressed by the end of the twentieth century.
zh: 无法预测到二十世纪末，科学会发展到什么程度。

en: In the course of the twentieth century all this changed.
zh: 在二十世纪的过程中，这一切都改变了。

en: Twenty police have arrived on the scene.
zh: 二十名警察已经赶到现场。

en: A toast to your 20th Anniversary!
zh: 为您的20周年纪念日干杯！

en: If I were twenty, I could vote.
zh: 如果我二十岁，我就可以投票了。

en: Don't smoke until you're 20 years old.
zh: 在你20岁之前不要吸烟。

en: She did not decide to be a singer until she reached the age of twenty.
zh: 她直到二十岁才决定当歌手。

en: No less than twenty houses were burnt down.
zh: 至少有二十栋房屋被烧毁。

en: For quantities of 20 or more, we can allow you a special discount of 10% on the prices quoted.
zh: 如果订购20个或更多，我们可以给您报价的特别折扣10％。

en: If we place an order for more than 20 units, would you reduce the price?
zh: 如果我们订购超过20个单位，你们会降价吗？

en: We could see the summit of a mountain twenty miles away.
zh: 我们可以看到二十英里外的一座山的山顶。

en: We deliver your order free of charge within a 20-mile limit.
zh: 我们在20英里的范围内免费送货。

en: Twenty miles is a long distance to walk.
zh: 二十英里是很长的步行距离。

en: Some 20 issues have been agreed on.
zh: 大约二十个问题已经达成一致。

en: Prices have been reduced by 20 to 40 percent.
zh: 价格降低了百分之二十到四十。

en: Can you make change for a 20-dollar bill?
zh: 你能把一张二十美元的钞票换开吗？

en: Twenties and some smaller bills, please.
zh: 要二十美元的和一些小额钞票。

en: I'd like three twenties, six fives, and the rest in ones.
zh: 我要三张二十美元的，六张五美元的，剩下的都换成一美元的。

en: Twenty teams entered the tournament.
zh: 二十支队伍参加了比赛。

en: By 2030 twenty-one percent of its population will be over sixty-five.
zh: 到2030年，该国百分之二十一的人口将超过六十五岁。

en: By the year 2020, the population of this city will have doubled.
zh: 到2020年，这个城市的人口将会翻一番。

en: Two hundred people died of cholera last year.
zh: 去年有两百人死于霍乱。

en: Sum up the passage within 200 words.
zh: 请把这篇文章总结成两百字以内。

en: 2001 is the year when the 21st century begins.
zh: 2001年是21世纪开始的年份。

en: Tuition will be raised by nearly ten percent as of April 1, 2001.
zh: 从2001年4月1日起，学费将上涨近百分之十。

en: 2. Cut the daikon into long sticks.
zh: 2. 把白萝卜切成长条。

en: Two, four, six, etc. are even numbers.
zh: 二、四、六等是偶数。

en: A few minutes' walk brought me to the shore.
zh: 走了几分钟就到了岸边。

en: I saw him go into the toilet a few minutes ago.
zh: 几分钟前我看见他进了厕所。

en: Could you spare me a few minutes?
zh: 你能抽出几分钟时间给我吗？

en: I had hardly walked for a few minutes when it began to rain.
zh: 我刚走了几分钟就开始下雨了。

en: I have a few minutes to spare.
zh: 我有几分钟空闲时间。

en: Your gums will get numb in a few minutes.
zh: 几分钟后你的牙龈会麻木。

en: I'll be with you in a few minutes.
zh: 我几分钟后就来。

en: A few years ago, our room had little furniture in it.
zh: 几年前，我们房间里几乎没什么家具。

en: I want to extend my stay here for a few more days.
zh: 我想把我的住宿再延长几天。

en: I saw him at the station a few days ago.
zh: 几天前我在车站见过他。

en: You'd better stay in bed for a few days.
zh: 你最好卧床休息几天。

en: Please take a rest for a few days.
zh: 请休息几天。

en: A few days' rest will do you good.
zh: 休息几天对你有好处。

en: It'll pass in a few days.
zh: 过几天就会好的。

en: It is hard to see the sights of Tokyo in a few days.
zh: 几天之内很难游览东京的景点。

en: It was not until a few days later that he arrived.
zh: 过了几天他才到达。

en: It was not until a few days later that the news arrived.
zh: 过了几天消息才传到。

en: He stayed there a couple of days.
zh: 他在那里待了几天。

en: He will be back in a few days.
zh: 他过几天就回来了。

en: The blossoms will be out in a few days.
zh: 过几天花就会开了。

en: You'll be all right again in a couple of days.
zh: 过几天你就会好起来的。

en: I wonder if you would mind lending me your car for a couple of days.
zh: 不知道你是否介意把你的车借给我几天。

en: Call me every few days, and in that way we can keep in touch if something happens.
zh: 每隔几天给我打个电话，这样如果发生什么事，我们就可以保持联系。

en: I've been there a couple of times.
zh: 我去过几次那里。

en: A few students were left behind.
zh: 有几个学生被留下了。

en: The leaves will turn red in two or three weeks.
zh: 两三个星期后，树叶就会变红。

en: May I ask a few questions?
zh: 我可以问几个问题吗？

en: You'll have bleeding for a few hours.
zh: 你会有几个小时的出血。

en: Can you pick out a few good books to read?
zh: 你能挑出几本好书来读吗？

en: Apart from a few minor mistakes, your composition was excellent.
zh: 除了几个小错误，你的作文很棒。

en: Except for a few mistakes, his composition is perfect.
zh: 除了几个错误，他的作文是完美的。

en: Apart from a few faults, he is a trustworthy partner.
zh: 除了几个缺点，他是一个值得信赖的伙伴。

en: A few months later they return to their breeding grounds in the Arctic.
zh: 几个月后，他们返回北极的繁殖地。

en: With first base open, he walked the batter.
zh: 由于一垒无人，他保送了击球手。

en: Can you exchange a 10000 yen note into 50 pence coins?
zh: 你能把一张一万日元的纸币换成50便士的硬币吗？

en: Can you break a 10000 yen bill?
zh: 你能把一万日元的纸币找开吗？

en: It will cost more than ten thousand yen.
zh: 这要花费一万日元以上。

en: Ten thousand yen will not cover the expenses.
zh: 一万日元不够支付这些费用。

en: Will ten thousand yen do?
zh: 一万日元够吗？

en: You need great endurance to run ten thousand meters.
zh: 跑一万米需要极大的耐力。

en: A fallen leaf floated on the surface of the water.
zh: 一片落叶漂浮在水面上。

en: A dead leaf fell to the ground.
zh: 一片枯叶落到地上。

en: The output power of a one square meter solar panel is about one watt, so it is difficult to use solar power on a large scale at present.
zh: 一平方米太阳能电池板的输出功率约为一瓦，因此目前很难大规模使用太阳能。

en: I had scarcely walked a minute before I met him.
zh: 我几乎没走一分钟就遇到他了。

en: He missed the train by a minute.
zh: 他错过火车一分钟。

en: I had hardly waited a minute when he came.
zh: 我几乎没等一分钟他就来了。

en: We can ill afford to lose a minute.
zh: 我们经不起浪费一分钟的时间。

en: Because just one minute costs nearly four pounds.
zh: 因为仅仅一分钟就要花费近四英镑。

en: It's only six pence per second.
zh: 每秒钟只要六便士。

en: The house was empty except for a cat.
zh: 除了猫，房子里空无一人。

en: A grasshopper and many ants lived in a field.
zh: 一只蚱蜢和许多蚂蚁住在一块田地里。

en: A cat appeared from behind the curtain.
zh: 一只猫从窗帘后面出现了。

en: A dog is running in the park.
zh: 一只狗在公园里跑。

en: Could you please put me up for the night?
zh: 今晚能借宿一晚吗？

en: I'd like two singles for three nights from the 21st for about sixty dollars a night.
zh: 我想订两间单人房，从21号开始住三晚，每晚大约六十美元。

en: We have a single for 50 dollars per night.
zh: 我们有一间单人房，每晚50美元。

en: I'd like a double for four nights from tonight for about fifty dollars a night.
zh: 我想订一间双人房，从今晚开始住四晚，每晚大约五十美元。

en: A cup of hot soup relaxed me.
zh: 一杯热汤让我放松下来。

en: I would rather work for any company than waste another year.
zh: 我宁愿为任何公司工作，也不愿再浪费一年时间。

en: It is an exciting time of the year.
zh: 这是一年中令人兴奋的时刻。

en: Compared with the level of a year ago, the price is sharply lower.
zh: 与一年前的水平相比，价格大幅下降。

en: I wish he could have driven a car a year ago.
zh: 我希望他一年前就能开车了。

en: I have not heard from her for a year.
zh: 我已经一年没有收到她的消息了。

en: In the course of a year my son grew stronger.
zh: 在一年里，我的儿子变得更强壮了。

en: I'll have you all speaking fluent English within a year.
zh: 我保证一年之内让你们都能说一口流利的英语。

en: The first season of the year is spring.
zh: 一年中的第一个季节是春天。

en: The weather changes very often at this time of year.
zh: 一年中的这个时候天气变化非常频繁。

en: There are four seasons in a year: spring, summer, fall and winter.
zh: 一年有四季：春、夏、秋、冬。

en: How many seasons are there in a year?
zh: 一年有几个季节？

en: A year has twelve months.
zh: 一年有十二个月。

en: I'll see to it that you have a raise after the first year.
zh: 我会确保你在第一年之后得到加薪。

en: A year had passed by and his body turned to dust.
zh: 一年过去了，他的身体化为尘土。

en: I was feeling blue all day.
zh: 我一整天都感到很沮丧。

en: I am dead tired from walking around all day.
zh: 我走了一整天，累死了。

en: They were pretty tired after having worked all day.
zh: 他们工作了一整天，非常疲惫。

en: It has kept raining all day.
zh: 已经下了一整天的雨了。

en: He was playing tennis all day.
zh: 他打了一整天的网球。

en: I've been working all day.
zh: 我工作了一整天。

en: I got tired of lying in bed all day.
zh: 我厌倦了一整天躺在床上。

en: We are gaining a day.
zh: 我们多出了一天。

en: It's impossible to do the sights of Tokyo in a day or two.
zh: 在一天两天内游览完东京的景点是不可能的。

en: There is always heavy traffic here at this time of the day.
zh: 一天中的这个时候这里总是交通拥堵。

en: How many cruises are there each day?
zh: 每天有多少班游轮？

en: Please be sure to take one dose three times a day.
zh: 请务必每天服用三次，一次一剂。

en: Take the medicine three times a day.
zh: 每天吃三次药。

en: I cover twenty miles a day.
zh: 我每天走二十英里。

en: It is next to impossible to see Rome in a day.
zh: 一天之内游览罗马几乎是不可能的。

en: Do you have any day tours?
zh: 你们有一日游吗？

en: We have more apples than we could eat in a day.
zh: 我们的苹果多得一天都吃不完。

en: At the end of every day, his back was tired and his legs hurt.
zh: 每天结束时，他都腰酸背痛，腿也疼。

en: I go shopping every other day.
zh: 我每隔一天去购物。

en: Be sure to take medicine three times a day.
zh: 务必每天吃三次药。

en: An elephant was hunted there.
zh: 那里曾猎杀过一头大象。

en: Do you think you can live on a dollar a day in America?
zh: 你认为在美国一天靠一美元能生活吗？

en: It was Janet that won first prize.
zh: 是珍妮特赢得了头奖。

en: A monster lay on a rock near the top of the mountain.
zh: 一个怪物躺在山顶附近的一块岩石上。

en: I've won first prize!
zh: 我赢得了头奖！

en: Little did she dream that she could win first prize.
zh: 她做梦也没想到自己能赢得头奖。

en: Never did I dream of winning first prize.
zh: 我从未梦想过赢得头奖。

en: Everybody fails once or twice.
zh: 每个人都会失败一两次。

en: There is but one chance left.
zh: 只剩下一次机会了。

en: I must buy one.
zh: 我必须买一个。

en: A car stopped at the entrance.
zh: 一辆汽车停在入口处。

en: A truck was careering along the road.
zh: 一辆卡车沿着道路飞驰。

en: A pair of gloves was left in the taxi.
zh: 一副手套被遗忘在出租车里。

en: He makes a religion of never wasting a penny.
zh: 他把从不浪费一分钱当成一种信仰。

en: Ten million yen will be ample for the project.
zh: 一千万日元对于这个项目来说已经足够了。

en: A century is one hundred years.
zh: 一个世纪是一百年。

en: A boy was walking with his hands in his pockets.
zh: 一个男孩双手插在口袋里走着。

en: One lives in Fukuoka, and the others live in Niigata.
zh: 一个住在福冈，其他的住在新泻。

en: One is Japanese and the other is Italian.
zh: 一个是日本人，另一个是意大利人。
